name: verify
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool email_utilities.
Tool description: API to validate email and normalize email
API description: Verifies an email address by normalizing it and optionally checking SMTP and suggesting a valid domain.

email.description: The email address to be verified.

checksmtp.description: Whether to check the SMTP server on port 25. Defaults to None.

suggestdomain.description: Whether to suggest a valid domain if the provided one is incorrect. Defaults to None.
